languages.text: "Ты могла бы стать арбитром, сестра. Почему наставники в Схола Прогениум направили тебя по иному пути?"
"You could have been an Arbitrator, Sister. Why did the mentors in the Schola Progenium direct you down a different path?"
languages.original_text: "Ты могла бы стать арбитром, сестра. Почему наставники в Схола Прогениум направили тебя по иному пути?"

traits.locale_text: "You could have been an Arbitrator, Sister. Why did the mentors in the Schola direct you down a different path?"
"You could have been an Arbitrator, Sister. Why did the mentors in the Schola direct you down a different path?"
"You could have been an Arbitrator, Sister. Why did the mentors in the Schola direct you down a different path?"
"You could have been an Arbitrator, Sister. Why did the mentors in the Schola Progenium direct you down a different path?"
"You could have been an Arbitrator, Sister. Why did the mentors in the Schola Progenium direct you down a different path?"

languages.text: 「シスター、お前ならアービトレイターになれたはずだ。なぜ教導院のメンターたちは、お前を別の道へと導いたのだろう？」
languages.original_text: "You could have been an Arbitrator, Sister. Why did the mentors in the Schola Progenium direct you down a different path?"

traits.locale_text: 「シスター、お前ならアービトレイターになれたはずだ。なぜ教導院のメンターたちは、お前を別の道へと導いたのだろう？」

languages.text: "Ihr hättet Arbitrator werden können, Schwester. Warum haben die Mentoren in der Schola Progenium Euch auf einen anderen Weg geführt?"
languages.original_text: "You could have been an Arbitrator, Sister. Why did the mentors in the Schola Progenium direct you down a different path?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hättet Arbitrator werden können, Schwester. Warum haben die Mentoren in der Schola Progenium Euch auf einen anderen Weg geführt?"

languages.text: « Vous auriez pu devenir arbitrator, ma sœur. Comment se fait-il que les mentors de la Schola Progenium ne vous aient pas orientée sur une autre voie ? »
languages.original_text: "You could have been an Arbitrator, Sister. Why did the mentors in the Schola Progenium direct you down a different path?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous auriez pu devenir arbitrator, ma sœur. Comment se fait-il que les mentors de la Schola Progenium ne vous aient pas orientée sur une autre voie ? »

languages.text: «Podría haber sido Arbitrator, hermana. ¿Por qué la guiaron los mentores de la Schola Progenium por un camino diferente?».
languages.original_text: "You could have been an Arbitrator, Sister. Why did the mentors in the Schola Progenium direct you down a different path?"

traits.locale_text: «Podría haber sido Arbitrator, hermana. ¿Por qué la guiaron los mentores de la Schola Progenium por un camino diferente?».

languages.text: “你本可以踏上法务官的道路，修女。为什么你在忠嗣学院的导师要指引你走上另一条截然不同的道路？”
languages.original_text: "You could have been an Arbitrator, Sister. Why did the mentors in the Schola Progenium direct you down a different path?"

traits.locale_text: “你本可以踏上法务官的道路，修女。为什么你在忠嗣学院的导师要指引你走上另一条截然不同的道路？”

languages.text: "Yargıcı olabilirdin Rahibe. Neden Schola Progenium'daki yönderler, sana bu yola yönlendirdi?"
languages.original_text: "You could have been an Arbitrator, Sister. Why did the mentors in the Schola Progenium direct you down a different path?"
